DDL.statement: CREATE VIEW [dbo].[view_label_data] AS SELECT dbo.APP_LABEL_DATA.UNIQUE_ID, dbo.APP_LABEL_DATA.PRINT_DATE, dbo.APP_LABEL_DATA.USER_ID, dbo.APP_LABEL_DATA.WORKSTATION_ID, dbo.APP_LABEL_DATA.MATERIAL, dbo.APP_LABEL_DATA.MATERIAL_TYPE, dbo.APP_LABEL_DATA.BATCH_NUMBER, dbo.APP_LABEL_DATA.PROCESS_ORDER, dbo.APP_LABEL_DATA.REQUIRED_RESOURCE, dbo.APP_LABEL_DATA.LOCATION_ID, dbo.APP_LABEL_DATA.PROD_QUANTITY, dbo.APP_LABEL_DATA.PROD_UOM, dbo.APP_LABEL_DATA.DATE_OF_MANUFACTURE, dbo.APP_LABEL_DATA.EXPIRY_DATE, dbo.APP_LABEL_DATA.EXPIRY_MODE, dbo.APP_LABEL_DATA.PROD_EAN, dbo.APP_LABEL_DATA.PROD_VARIANT, dbo.APP_LABEL_DATA.CUSTOMER_ID, dbo.APP_LABEL_DATA.PRINT_COPIES, dbo.APP_LABEL_DATA.PRINT_QUEUE_NAME, dbo.APP_LABEL_DATA.BASE_EAN, dbo.APP_LABEL_DATA.BASE_VARIANT, dbo.APP_LABEL_DATA.BASE_QUANTITY, dbo.APP_LABEL_DATA.BASE_UOM, dbo.APP_LABEL_DATA.MODULE_ID, dbo.APP_LABEL_DATA.OVERRIDE_MANUFACTURE_DATE, dbo.APP_LABEL_DATA.OVERRIDE_EXPIRY_DATE, dbo.APP_LABEL_DATA.OVERRIDE_BATCH_PREFIX, dbo.APP_LABEL_DATA.BATCH_PREFIX, dbo.APP_LABEL_DATA.BATCH_SUFFIX, dbo.APP_LABEL_DATA.LABEL_TYPE, dbo.APP_LABEL_DATA.LINE, dbo.APP_CUSTOMER.CUSTOMER_NAME, dbo.APP_MATERIAL.DESCRIPTION AS MATERIAL_DESCRIPTION, dbo.APP_MATERIAL_CUSTOMER_DATA.DATA AS PART_NO FROM dbo.APP_LABEL_DATA LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.APP_CUSTOMER ON dbo.APP_LABEL_DATA.CUSTOMER_ID = dbo.APP_CUSTOMER.CUSTOMER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.APP_MATERIAL ON dbo.APP_LABEL_DATA.MATERIAL = dbo.APP_MATERIAL.MATERIAL LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.APP_MATERIAL_CUSTOMER_DATA ON dbo.APP_MATERIAL_CUSTOMER_DATA.MATERIAL = dbo.APP_LABEL_DATA.MATERIAL AND dbo.APP_MATERIAL_CUSTOMER_DATA.CUSTOMER_ID = dbo.APP_LABEL_DATA.CUSTOMER_ID AND dbo.APP_MATERIAL_CUSTOMER_DATA.DATA_ID = 'PART_NO'
